heads.bio: Leads all traditional sports operations, focusing on physical conditioning and tournament execution.

heads.bio: Drives competitive gaming strategy, manages digital leagues, and oversees broadcast production.

coordinators.name: Karthikeyan
coordinators.bio: Responsible for managing equipment inventory, organizing practice schedules, and fitness drills.

coordinators.name: Shrish
coordinators.bio: Analyzes opponent data, scouts talent, and assists E-Sports captains with in-game strategy.

members.bio: Contributor to intramural events and team coordination.

members.name: Sangeetha
members.bio: Focuses on event logistics and participant registration.

members.name: Ganesh
members.bio: Active participant in E-Sports leagues and community engagement.

members.name: Rohini
members.bio: Assists with field setup and athletic event management.

members.name: Anil
members.bio: Core team member for team roster management and match scheduling.

members.name: Nitish
members.bio: Contributor to physical conditioning workshops and fitness drives.

members.name: Chandu
members.bio: Assists with E-Sports tournament execution and technical setup.

members.name: G Tarun
members.bio: Focuses on organizing competitive gaming events and player onboarding.

members.name: Abhiram
members.bio: Enthusiastic participant and volunteer for large-scale sports events.

members.name: Dayakar
members.bio: Assists with promotion and digital communication for matches.

members.name: Rakesh
members.bio: Contributor to sports scoring and result tabulation.

members.name: Jashwanth

members.name: Shiva Shankar
members.bio: Active member of the E-Sports player community and training sessions.

roles.title: Physical Sports Management
responsibilities: Tournament Organization: Scheduling, venue preparation, and rule enforcement for physical games.
Training: Leading fitness drills and managing equipment.
Team Captaincy: Providing on-field leadership for various teams.

roles.title: E-Sports Strategy & Broadcast
responsibilities: League Management: Organizing digital leagues, handling registrations, and result tracking.
Strategy: Analyzing gameplay, scouting opponents, and assisting with team composition.
Production: Managing live stream setup and commentary during key matches.

roles.title: Unified Logistics
responsibilities: Coordination: Managing volunteers and resources for both physical and digital events.
Documentation: Recording match results, player statistics, and event reports.
Recruitment: Identifying and onboarding new talent for all competitive arenas.
